thread.title: BRIEF-D & O Green Technologies Posts Qtrly Net ‍Profit Of 6.9 Mln RGT

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-D & O Green Technologies Posts Qtrly Net ‍Profit Of 6.9 Mln RGT

organizations.name: reuters) - d & o green technologies bhd

text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - D & O Green Technologies Bhd:
* QTRLY NET ‍PROFIT 6.9 MILLION RGT ; QTRLY REVENUE 132.5 MILLION RGT​
* YEAR AGO QTRLY REVENUE 128.6 MILLION RGT, YEAR AGO QTRLY NET PROFIT 3.8 MILLION RGT ‍​
* BOARD PROPOSES FINAL SINGLE-TIER-TAX DIVIDEND OF 0.5 SEN PER ORDINARY SHARE FOR FY ENDED 31 DEC 2017‍​ Source text ( bit.ly/2Gxjwxo ) Further company coverage:
